title: Good Intentions
description: Book 2 in the Welcome to Paradise SeriesOur eyes meet and we spend a moment looking into the others', reading the fear and the love that mingles within. I die inside knowing that I won't get to see her face every day. I can't help myself when it comes to her.I have faith our love can overcome the obstacles that will undoubtedly arise, but I still worry... Will our good intentions be good enough?
author: S.L. Scott
